lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - Confiding in a Conniving Friend

sentence.idiomatic: You must be mistaken. He probably wouldn’t do that.
I think you must be a talented person. I hope I haven’t misjudged.
I haven’t misjudged him. He certainly is a friend deserving of trust.
What kind of bad things have you done behind mom’s back again?
He is dating another woman behind his girlfriend’s back.
We need to do this thing behind his back.
Sorry, the user you have dialed has the phone switched off.
His cell phone is already switched off.
I didn’t notice when my cell phone got switched off.
I never realized that he is this kind of person.
It's already 10:00 am. I never expected that you would still be sleeping.
She said she would come, but to my surprise she didn’t come.
I saw him chatting flirtatiously with a girl.
You two — don’t just flirt around with each other there — come here to help out.
They are flirting over there. Let’s not disturb them.
I didn’t do it. Why in the world are you saying I have a guilty conscience?
His manner is definitely that of a one with a guilty conscience.
As soon as we saw his nervous manner, we knew he had a guilty conscience.
You should find some time every day to spend with your child.
Thank you for finding time to see me.
Don’t worry, I will find time to go over and look.
Is this person you found reliable?
He is not reliable. Don’t trust him.
Don’t worry, my information is absolutely reliable.
I have always been totally devoted to you.
He has devoted his entire life to serve the people.

word.literal: with all one's heart and soul

sentence.idiomatic: He doesn’t love you with all his heart and soul.
Chen Jing, I feel like I’ve misjudged someone.
What’s wrong? I thought things with you and Zhang Liang were going pretty well, weren’t they?

It seems he has been seeing a co-worker of his behind my back. Yesterday he said he was working overtime. I called his cell phone to show some concern for him, but never expected to find that he had his phone switched off.
What? It's surprising that he would have his phone turned off. But Zhang Liang is so trustworthy, it shouldn’t be a problem. It’s probably that his battery died.

At first that’s what I thought too. So I also called his company. To my surprise, it was a woman that answered. Plus, she was laughing her head off – it was obvious that she was flirting around with Zhang Liang.
No way! Maybe you're thinking too much. It’s normal for co-workers to joke around with each other.
My feeling can’t be wrong. When Zhang Liang answered the phone he was very nervous. It must be because he has a guilty conscience.
Maybe it’s because Zhang Liang’s work has been busy, and you haven’t had time to even meet; so that’s why you’re thinking this way.
But, before, no matter how busy he was, he would always find time to spend with me.
Hmm, so that’s why I say that all men are unreliable. They always think about their own careers, their own affairs.

word.literal: with all one's heart and soul

sentence.idiomatic: Uh-huh. So that’s why I said that I had misjudged him. I need a person who can love me with all their heart and soul.
I know. Actually, Zhang Liang is really not bad. It’s just that he isn’t the most suitable person for you.

word.literal: wholeheartedly; with all one’s heart and soul
